title: Fact Check: The truth behind this viral picture of PM Modi with President Trump and Xi Jinping | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture has surfaced on the internet in which Prime Minister Narendra Modi can be seen washing the feet of US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping.

ALSO READ: Here’s the truth behind this picture of SSR’s sister…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture in which PM Modi was actually washing the feet of sanitation workers in Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh.

Several other reports also suggested that PM Modi had, on February 24, 2019, washed the feet of sanitation workers who had worked at the Kumbh Mela.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that President Trump and President Xi’s faces were superimposed using photo editing software to create a false narrative.

In conclusion, the above fact-check establishes that the picture in question is FAKE.
